name: Cyberpunk Fighting
description:
Cyberpunk Fighting - is unusual 2D quest game with fighting elements made as cyberpunk style in which you will learn about a difficult destiny of a street fighter Leroy.
The main aim of the game is doing different quests, exploration of various picturesque locations, looking for different caches with valuables that will help in further development of your hero, and, of course, endless underground fights. There are five enemies, each of which is harder than the previous. To finish the game, you must defeat all five. Earn money, buy equipment and gun, food and everything that help to win in every uneasy fight. We are sure that exciting and dynamic gameplay won't be boring and make you satisfied with the world of underground fights.

KEY FEATURES:

- Gorgeous pixel graphics.
- Dynamic gameplay.
- Open world.
- Your decision influence on the plot.
- Fascinating atmosphere.
